original: intros H. apply fmap_reifier_default with (X := nat). - constructor. apply 0. - intros x Hx. apply H. apply Hx. - apply fmap_bound with (P := P) in H as [m Hm]. exists m. intros x Hx. specialize (Hm x Hx) as [y [Hy HPxy]]. exists y. split. + apply Hy. + apply HPxy.
